about_the_game:
"Pioneers of Pagonia - Official Guide" is your indispensable companion for the epic city-building and strategy game Pioneers of Pagonia. This comprehensive handbook provides detailed instructions and valuable tips to help you build and defend your settlement successfully on 190 pages.

Discover the secrets of various regions, master resource management, and learn how to forge alliances with other villages—or defeat your enemies.

Packed with step-by-step guides, detailed tables, and strategic advice, this book is your key to thriving in the world of Pagonia. Perfect for both beginners and seasoned players alike!

Inside you'll find:

  • The Basics: Learn the game mechanics, objectives, and map structure.

  • Menus and Interface: Get an overview of the various menus and how to use them effectively.

  • Your First Buildings: Step-by-step instructions for constructing your first buildings and establishing your settlement.

  • The World of Pagonia: Explore the different maps, their unique features, and available resources.

  • Resource Management: Tips and tricks for efficiently managing resources like wood, stone, food, and more.

  • uildings and Professions: Detailed information on various buildings and the roles of your villagers.

  • Being a Leader: Strategies for growing and expanding your kingdom and increasing your population.

  • Friendship and Trade: How to form alliances with other villages and benefit from trade.

  • Defeating Enemies: Learn about the different types of enemies and how to overcome them.

  • Multiplayer: Tips for playing cooperatively with friends.

  • ...and much more!

Available in English and German. Both versions will be installed automatically.

Where do I find the guidebook after purchase?

After the installation, Steam automatically saves the PDF file in the Pioneers of Pagonia folder. Usually, this is:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Pioneers of Pagonia\Official Guide

In case you can't find the DLC there, make sure you have downloaded it. To do so, please right-click on Pioneers of Pagonia in your Steam library, select "Properties" --> "DLC" and ensure that the guidebook DLC has a blue check mark.
